rule: If "CantAnswer" is chosen as the output, it must signify the chatbot was completely unable to process or make a determination for any unspecified reason.
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists of a single tag, 'JJ'. The description explicitly lists 'JJ' as a valid part-of-speech tag (Adjective). The output adheres to the requirement of returning *only* the part-of-speech tag.
OK
